code: import React from"react";import"./Meme.css";function Meme(props){var viewPortWidth=window.innerWidth;var memeWidth=props.data.width;var scaleDown={};var normalSize={};if(viewPortWidth<500){scaleDown={width:"90%",height:"auto"};if(memeWidth>300)normalSize={width:"300px",height:"auto"};else normalSize={width:props.data.width,height:props.data.height};}else{if(memeWidth>750){scaleDown={width:"35%",height:"auto"};}else scaleDown={width:"70%",height:"auto"};normalSize={width:props.data.width,height:props.data.height};}return React.createElement("div",{id:"memeWrapper"},React.createElement("img",{style:props.data.width>500?scaleDown:normalSize,alt:"Dank Meme",src:props.data.img,onLoad:function onLoad(){return props.handleLoad("hidden","visible");}}),React.createElement("h2",{className:"memeTopText"},props.topText),React.createElement("h2",{className:"memeBottomText"},props.bottomText));}export default Meme;
